about_the_game:
This DLC contains 3 brand new tenants, in addition to single-player CGs, additional multiplayer CGs with other tenants will be unlocked!

Zi Han

She was fired from the company a few days ago and now unemployed. Lazy personality and lack of energy. Destroyed by life, she is locked at home all day, indulging in the Internet world under the name Zihan, escaping from reality.

Rina

She joined the sensual scene at a young age and is now a battle-hardened queen of joy. Although she is proficient in all kinds of techniques to please men, she also develops a sense of crisis as she grows older; she wants to take advantage of her youth to earn enough money to spend the rest of her life.

Ayano

Small traditional company owner. A few years ago, her father had a physical condition, and she was forced to inherit the family business not long after graduating from college. In the past few years, her business has also grown considerably. Since there are many clients in the city, it is convenient to have a place to live whenever you want to rent a house here.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or for viewing in the workplace.
・Alcohol
・Nudity
・Bondage
・hypnosis
・Oral sex
・Sexual innuendo
・Sexual acts
・Multi-sexual intercourse
・Non-consensual intercourse
・Strong language

All characters in this story are 18 years of age or older.

name: Secret Camera Tenant Pack2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 / Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G / Intel Core i7-4930K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 / Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This DLC contains 3 brand new tenants, in addition to the single CG, it will additionally unlock multiplayer CGs with other tenants!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese
